title: Replace post-unlock events header logo with uploaded image

requirements.text: Update the post-password Events Hub header (the header shown on the events list screen after entering the password) to remove the current logo icon and use the user-provided uploaded image as the header logo instead.

quotes:
The logo you used inside the 
Is not looking good 
Remove that logo icon 

And add this there

Use this image as a header logo
In the interface which comes after the puting the password and where all the events exists

acceptanceCriteria: On the Events Hub screen (events list after password unlock), the header no longer displays the existing icon logo image currently used in the header.
The header displays the uploaded image as the logo in its place.
The logo remains responsive (does not overflow/crop awkwardly) across common mobile widths.

requirements.text: Add the two uploaded image files to the frontend static assets and reference the selected one from the post-unlock header component. Uploaded files: `file_000000007b7c7206b4fb54a3c1ce9985.png`, `file_00000000b7ac720681a2c7cc9dc00ef9 (1).jpg`.

quotes: Use this image as a header logo

acceptanceCriteria: Both uploaded images are present in the frontend as static assets (served by the frontend, not via backend).
The post-unlock header component references the chosen uploaded image via a stable static path (no broken image link in production build).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo` (no additional backend services).
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.
Use English for any user-facing text changed or added as part of this request.
nonGoals: Fixing/diagnosing the platform configuration/build error (requires Caffeine team assistance).
Changing any event content, password logic, or game mechanics beyond the header logo replacement.
